**2022-12-14 / @rsc, @griesemer, @ianlancetaylor, @adonovan, @andybons, @aclements**

**Accepted**

- **all: end support for Windows 7, Windows Server 2008 in Go 1.21** [#57003](https://go.dev/issue/57003)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **all: end support for Windows 8, Windows Server 2012 in Go 1.21 or 1.22** [#57004](https://go.dev/issue/57004)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **context: add APIs for setting a cancelation cause when deadline or timer expires** [#56661](https://go.dev/issue/56661)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **crypto/x509: add String() for KeyUsage, ExtKeyUsage** [#56866](https://go.dev/issue/56866)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **net: add support for MPTCP** [#56539](https://go.dev/issue/56539)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **reflect: add Value.Clear** [#55002](https://go.dev/issue/55002)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **runtime/metrics: add /gc/heap/live:bytes** [#56857](https://go.dev/issue/56857)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ

**Declined**

- **testing: t.TempDir() should return actual path on macOS** [#56259](https://go.dev/issue/56259)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- **x/exp/slices: add Sorted** [#56692](https://go.dev/issue/56692)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- **x/time/rate: make Wait return an error that Is(DeadlineExceeded) for deadline miss** [#54541](https://go.dev/issue/54541)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**

**Likely Accept**

- **cmd/go: support a -C flag value to not use any current directory** [#56868](https://go.dev/issue/56868)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **crypto/rsa: deprecate GenerateMultiPrimeKey and PrecomputedValues.CRTValues** [#56921](https://go.dev/issue/56921)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **math: add Compare and Compare32** [#56491](https://go.dev/issue/56491)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **x/net/http2: support consuming PUSH\_PROMISE streams in the client** [#18594](https://go.dev/issue/18594)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **x/net/ipv{4,6}: adopt net/netip address types** [#54883](https://go.dev/issue/54883)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥

**Likely Decline**

- **bytes, strings: add Truncate** [#56885](https://go.dev/issue/56885)
  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **database/sql: Support for generics with NullTypes Interface** [#56439](https://go.dev/issue/56439)
  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ‚è≥
